snippet: The president spoke to reporters before leaving for Hawaii at the end of a week in which he has sought to demonstrate his commitment to fighting terrorism.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: The president spoke to reporters before leaving for Hawaii at the end of a week in which he has sought to demonstrate his commitment to fighting terrorism.

headline.main: Obama Discusses Difficulty of Detecting Terrorism at Year-End Conference
